ygData.subject: RE: Magical attack for a bard.
ygData.msgSnippet: I use magical gloves and a non-magical instrument.  The punching does hurt wisps and ghouls.  I would assume its the same on test, unless its been nerfed.
ygData.messageBody:
I use magical gloves and a non-magical instrument. The punching does hurt
wisps and ghouls. I would assume its the same on test, unless its been
nerfed.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Ken Bachman [mailto:kbachman@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 30, 1999 8:34 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Magical attack for a bard.


From: Ken Bachman <kbachman@...>

Perhaps a Princess... wrote:
>
> From: "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...>
>
> ... since a magical instrument still seems a ways away.
> Will my damage songs damage the wisps without one?
> HOw about if I have magical gloves and not magical instrument
>
> Faesong, level 10 Songweaver of Solusek Ro
>

Yes, your songs will damage the wisps. It will take you awhile to kill
them with just the bellow and the low-level AE (and using the AE will
probably put you in range to get hit), but it can be done.

The gloves are supposed to hit them (if they don't, send a bug report),
not sure what happens if you have magical gloves AND a non-magical
instrument equipped at the same time. Try it, you're on the test server,
after all. ;)

Kenross Cantoforjado, 34 songs, Innoruuk

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
